title: Personalizable Long-Context Symbolic Music Infilling with MIDI-RWKV
author: Christian Zhou-Zheng (Metacreation Lab, Simon Fraser University), Philippe Pasquier (Metacreation Lab, Simon Fraser University), ...
relevance_why: This paper presents a framework designed for symbolic music generation, which can enhance generative AI tools like MusicLDM by providing strategies for long-context generation and personalization, potentially useful for generating unique music from text inputs.
background: This research introduces a model for generating and completing multi-track symbolic music by leveraging long contextual information and user-defined musical attributes.
contribution: The paper introduces MIDI-RWKV, a long-context music infilling system that utilizes RWKV architecture to enhance computer-assisted music composition through effective context manipulation and personalization.
technical_comparison: Prior methods in symbolic music infilling are limited by short context windows and often lack user control. This work improves by employing the RWKV-7 architecture, which allows for infinite context lengths while maintaining coherency and control over musical attributes.
key_innovation: Utilizes new prompt formats and adaptive techniques to enable long-context symbolic music infilling effectively and facilitates user personalization without extensive retraining.
real_world_impact: This framework has the potential to empower composers by integrating seamlessly with digital audio workstations, thereby enhancing creative expression through AI-assisted music generation.
limitations: The model's dependency on training data could limit its effectiveness on highly unique styles outside its training distribution.

new_terms.RWKV: **RWKV** is a type of recurrent neural network architecture that is designed for efficient long-context sequence modeling, combining advantages of both recurrent and transformer models.
new_terms.Bar-Fill representation: **Bar-Fill representation** refers to a specific encoding format that facilitates symbolic music infilling by marking sections of music to be regenerated within a defined structure.

open_sourcing: Model weights and code available at https://github.com/christianazinn/MIDI-RWKV
